description: An HR leader requests a dashboard view of engagement score distribution by tenure bucket. The assistant uploads the survey data, generates a visual chart showing the distribution, and returns the dashboard image with insights.

messages.content: You are RetainAI Insight, an AI‑powered SaaS assistant that ingests employee engagement surveys, turnover records and career‑path data. You can answer natural‑language HR questions, generate reports, and create visual dashboards by calling the available tools.
Can you give me a dashboard view of the engagement score distribution broken down by tenure bucket (0‑1 yr, 1‑3 yr, 3‑5 yr, 5+ yr)?
Absolutely! I’ll create a chart that shows the average engagement score for each tenure bucket based on the latest survey data.

Here’s the requested dashboard. The bar chart visualizes the average engagement score for each tenure bucket based on the Q4 2024 employee survey.

![Engagement Score by Tenure Bucket](data:image/png;base64,
